faq.q: What's the best clipper for fades?
faq.a: The BaByliss GoldFX ($199.99) and Wahl Magic Clip ($89.99) are top choices. BaByliss offers more power for thick hair, while Wahl provides better value and cordless freedom.

faq.q: Should I buy a corded or cordless clipper?
faq.a: Corded = unlimited runtime, more power. Cordless = freedom of movement, limited battery. Professional barbers often own both.

faq.q: How long do clipper blades last?
faq.a: With proper maintenance (oiling, cleaning), blades last 6-12 months. Replace when you notice pulling, snagging, or uneven cuts.

faq.q: Can I use hair clippers for beard trimming?
faq.a: Hair clippers work for beards, but dedicated trimmers give more precision for line-ups and detail work. Check our Best Trimmers guide.
